briankendall/proxy-audio-device

Virtual audio driver enabling macOS system volume control for external interfaces

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Route audio between Mac apps with a virtual loopback driver
  • Manages audio devices from the macOS menu bar
  • System-wide audio equalizer and mixer for macOS
  • Streams audio to hardware players and software emulators
  • Accepts audio inputs for voice chat and analysis
  • lets you control app volumes and auto-pause music on mac
  • Switches audio devices based on priority
  • voice-to-text app for macOS
  • Streams audio from Jellyfin servers to mobile devices
  • Side-channel audio attack through computer mice
